price: Sabihin mo: “O mga tao, ako lamang para sa inyo ay isang mapagbabalang malinaw.”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
